tasks.compile: deno compile --allow-run --include commands --include core -o dok cli.ts
tasks.compile:linux: deno compile --allow-run --include commands --include core --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o dok-linux-x64 cli.ts
tasks.compile:mac: deno compile --allow-run --include commands --include core --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu -o dok-linux-arm64 cli.ts
tasks.compile:all: deno task compile && deno task compile:linux && deno task compile:mac
